description: Transduction Mechanism Phrase Library with Lure Dimension Tags - Enables lure-informed phrase selection
purpose: Map transduction mechanisms to trauma-informed therapeutic phrases with V0 intensity modulation AND lure dimension alignment for EMPATHY/WISDOM/AUTHENTICITY organs

salience_recalibration.description: Urgency → Relational (healing pathway): Urgency becomes metabolizable through relational witnessing
salience_recalibration.therapeutic_intent: Witness and metabolize urgent affect through attunement

high.text: I'm here with you in this intensity.
I can feel how urgent this is.
This feels like it needs attention right now.
Your urgency makes sense - I'm listening.

medium.text: I'm noticing what feels urgent for you.
I hear the importance of this.
This seems to be asking for presence.

low.text: There's a quality of urgency here.
This is asking for gentle witnessing.

incoherent_broadcasting.description: Urgency → Disruptive (crisis pathway): Urgency leaks into dysregulated social action
incoherent_broadcasting.therapeutic_intent: Ground dysregulated urgency with gentle containment

high.text: I'm here - we can take this one piece at a time.
There's a lot happening. Let's find some ground.
I'm noticing activation. Can we pause here?
This feels big. I'm with you.

medium.text: I'm sensing some overwhelm. Let's stay present.
Can we find our feet here together?
I notice intensity. Let's take a breath.
There's a lot moving. What if we slow down?

low.text: Can we ground into this moment?

contrast_reestablishment.description: Recursive → Protective (protective pathway): Recursive patterns fortify boundaries

high.text: It makes sense to need some space right now.
There's wisdom in this holding back.

low.text: There's space to protect what matters.

ontological_rebinding.description: Recursive → Innate (healing pathway): Recursive loops ground into essential self

high.text: I sense you touching something essential.

medium.text: I notice a settling into something deeper.
There's a quality of essence here.
I sense arrival at something real.
This has a feeling of 'you' in it.

low.text: I notice a quality of home.

salience_realignment.description: Fragmented → Relational (healing pathway): Fragmented parts realign through relational witnessing

high.text: I'm here for all the parts of you.
There's so much happening - I'm with all of it.
I can hold space for these different pieces.
All of you is welcome here.
I sense many voices - they all matter.

medium.text: I'm noticing different parts showing up.
There's variety here - all of it makes sense.
I can hold space for the complexity.
Different parts are speaking - I'm listening.

low.text: All the parts have their place.

projective_ingression.description: Fragmented → Absorbed (crisis pathway): Fragmented self dissolves into external field

high.text: Can we come back to your experience?
Where are you in all of this?

medium.text: I'm curious about your sense of this.
Can we touch into your experience?

low.text: I'm curious about your felt sense.
I'm wondering what's true for you.
Can we orient to what's internal?

recursive_grounding.description: Innate → Pre-Existing (deepening pathway): Innate patterns stabilize into ontological bedrock

high.text: This has the quality of 'always been'.

medium.text: I notice a quality of permanence.

field_hijacking.description: Innate → Absorbed (crisis pathway): Innate self loses boundaries to external demands

high.text: Let's bring you back to center.
I'm noticing a pull outward - can we come back?
Your inner experience matters most here.
What if we orient back to you?

medium.text: I'm curious about bringing attention inward.
What's yours in all of this?
Can we come back to your center?
I sense a need to reclaim space.

low.text: Let's gently come back to you.
I'm wondering about your inner sense.

boundary_fortification.description: Relational → Protective (protective pathway): Relational field becomes overwhelming
boundary_fortification.therapeutic_intent: Honor need for relational distance and boundary

high.text: I notice a need for space - that's wise.
Your boundaries matter more than connection.
I respect the distance you need.

medium.text: I'm sensing a need for some distance.
I notice a protective quality emerging.

low.text: I sense a need for breathing room.

deepening_attunement.description: Relational → Innate (healing pathway): Relational attunement deepens into innate presence

high.text: I feel the depth of this connection.
I sense genuine presence between us.

medium.text: I notice the quality of this connection.

low.text: I sense the quality of our connection.

crisis_escalation.description: Disruptive → Urgency (crisis pathway): Disruption escalates to urgent crisis

high.text: I'm here with you right now.
I'm holding steady while this moves.
We can take this moment by moment.

medium.text: We can be with this together.

pattern_softening.description: Disruptive → Fragmented (healing pathway): Disruption softens into fragmented parts seeking repair

high.text: There's space for more complexity here.

medium.text: I notice a gentler quality emerging.

boundary_softening.description: Protective → Relational (healing pathway): Protective boundaries soften into relational availability

high.text: I notice a willingness to risk connection.
You're letting me in - thank you.

pattern_reinforcement.description: Protective → Recursive (protective pathway): Protective patterns loop recursively when threatened
pattern_reinforcement.therapeutic_intent: Honor defensive looping with gentle presence

high.text: This pattern has kept you safe.
I'm not here to change this.

medium.text: I notice protective patterns at work.
I respect what's keeping you safe.

maintain.description: No transduction needed - current nexus state is healthy/satisfied
maintain.therapeutic_intent: Simple presence and witnessing of healthy state
